subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At first the Nets led by double digits, and despite LeBron James’ 42 points, managed to keep ahead of the Cavaliers, the team that knocked them out of the playoffs last season.
snippet: At first the Nets led by double digits, and despite LeBron James’ 42 points, managed to keep ahead of the Cavaliers, the team that knocked them out of the playoffs last season.
